label: vibrational spectrometer configuration specification
definition: A setting datum that specifies the needed settings of a spectrometer used in vibrational spectroscopy.

label: Raman spectrometer configuration
definition: A device setting that represents the measured or set physical qualities which make up the configuration state of a Raman spectrometer at the time of a measurement (e.g. operating temperature, exitation wavelength, groove density, ...).
example of usage: The set of meassured configuration characteristics of a Raman spectrometer, like the operating temperature of a Raman spectrometer.

label: exposure time setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the duration in which an electromagnetic radiation beam is exposed to / recorded by a photosensor.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: preamplifier gain setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the preamplifier gain in CCD sensors.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology.

label: horizontal shift speed setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the horizontal shift speed in CCD sensors.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: vertical shift speed setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the vertical shift speed in CCD sensors.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: device temperature setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the operating temperature of a device.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology.

label: number of scans setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the number of iterations performed in a spectroscopic meassurement from which an aggregated assay output is generated.
super class: setting datum|('part of' some 'vibrational spectrometer configuration specification')
example of usage: The setting entered into a Raman microscope which specifies the desired number of measurements this Raman microscope has to perform to produce an usable Raman spectrum.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology.

label: CCD sensor binning read mode setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the binning read mode of a device with a CCD sensor.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: groove density
definition: A physical quality of a diffraction grating that represents the number of grooves per length unit (e.g. mm) on the surface that causes the diffraction of the light.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: groove density setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the number of grooves in a diffraction grating device.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: diffraction grating
definition: A device that is an optical component with a periodic structure that diffracts light into several beams travelling in different directions (i.e. different diffraction angles)
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: deprecated_excitation wavelength
definition: A physical quality of the light source that is used used to excite a system to a higher energy state.
editor note: This class is not needed, as PATO:wavelength is sufficient, if this quality of a Raman device is really needed.

label: excitation wavelength setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the wavelength of an electromagnetic radiation source (e.g. a laser) which has the function to excite the energy state of a target material.
editor note: This class should better be defined in a more general device ontology or a domain ontology with the scope of optical devices.

label: objective magnification factor setting
definition: A setting datum that specifies the magnification factor of the objective collecting the scattered light.
